document_data.mainbody:
hitkeep was a district in the Outer City of Baldurs Gate. It neighbored the districts of Norchapel and Sows Foot, though the exact borders of each region were regularly debated.
The neighborhood was home to a sizable community of gnomes, many of whom worked as tinsmiths within the city.
As with many Outer City districts, Whitkeep had a problem with gang crime. The group known as Ganthalls Gallants regularly stole from Whitkeeps residents, but never targeted women.
* Whitkeep Hostel A large manor that attracted a significant number of radical-minded individuals.
